name: Mobile Droid Gumda
description:
Build, upgrade, and research mechs, weapons, and components. Manage employees and expand your base. Explore and collect resources. Find wanted mechs, destroy them, and collect bounties. Explore the post-nuclear wasteland and make the choices you believe are right.
Your decisions shape everything.

Unleash hell on your enemies

Dodge attacks, intercept missiles, emit pulse waves, reflect lasers - there are various mech abilities waiting for you to discover. Choose the perfect combination of components and weapons to defeat undefeatable enemies.
